4/ As the only verifier of compliance with the school food standards, we fully support these reforms🙌We're proud to work alongside @BiteBack2030, @sfmtweet & @Food_Foundation and continue to push for healthy and nutritious school food for all!

3/ @NadhimZahawi wants to “level up” school food for all through a mandatory approach to #SchoolFoodStandards. Schools will also be encouraged to embed a #WholeSchoolApproach to food such as learning to cook healthy meals - something Food for Life Schools are already championing!

2/ It's vital that schools are serving healthy, nutritious food, as this might be a child's only substantial meal of the day. While many schools are serving fantastic food, an estimated 60% of secondary schools could be failing to comply with the #SchoolFoodStandards🤯

1/ No matter what school children attend or where they live, every young person deserves healthy, nutritious #SchoolMeals🥘

When Peter Melchett founded Food for Life he founded on 3 principles for food:

1. 75% unprocessed
2. 50% local
3. 30% organic

Our schools, caterers, early years settings - let's continue to fly the flag for real food!

Thought-provoking ideas coming out from the Peter Melchett lecture:
🛒Should we benchmark supermarkets on their processed food placement and shelf space? 
🍱Should ultra-processed foods be taxed?
